tool_description: Monitors the health and functionality of individual sensors by analyzing signal quality, response patterns, and diagnostic indicators.

sensor_data.description: Recent sensor reading values for health assessment

sensor_id.description: Identifier of the sensor being monitored

check_type.description: Type of health check: signal_quality, response_time, or comprehensive

error_messages: Insufficient data: sensor_data must contain at least 10 readings for health assessment.
Invalid sensor ID: Provided sensor_id is not recognized in the system database.
Invalid check type: Use 'signal_quality', 'response_time', or 'comprehensive' for check_type.
Sensor communication failure: Unable to retrieve diagnostic data from the specified sensor.
Data corruption detected: Sensor data contains invalid values that prevent health assessment.
usage: Provide sensor_data array and sensor_id for the target sensor. Optionally specify check_type to focus on specific health aspects.

health_status.description: Overall sensor health status: healthy, degraded, or failing

health_score.description: Numeric health score from 0-100 (100 = perfect health)

issues_detected.description: List of specific issues or concerns identified

recommendations.description: Maintenance recommendations based on health assessment
